title: Units
description: A list of units, including their stats, type, and abilities.

unitType.title: Unit Type
unitType.description: The type of the unit. Must be in UnitTypes.json.

movement.title: Movement
movement.description: The amount of movement points the unit has.

strength.title: Strength
strength.description: The melee attack and defensive strength of the unit. If this and rangedStrength are omitted or 0, the unit will be a civilian.

rangedStrength.title: Ranged Strength
rangedStrength.description: The ranged attack and defensive strength of the unit. If omitted, the unit cannot ranged attack. If used, strength must be set too.

religiousStrength.title: Religious Strength
religiousStrength.description: The religious attack and defensive strength of the unit.

range.title: Range
range.description: The range from which ranged attacks can be performed.

interceptRange.title: Intercept Range
interceptRange.description: Air units attacking within this range will be intercepted.

cost.title: Cost
cost.description: The amount of production required to build this unit. The production needed is always positive.

hurryCostModifier.title: Hurry Cost Modifier
hurryCostModifier.description: If this unit is bought for gold, its price is increased by so much percent.

requiredResource.title: Required Resource
requiredResource.description: Resource that is consumed by building this unit. Must be in TileResources.json.

requiredTech.title: Required Tech
requiredTech.description: The tech required to build this unit. Must be in Techs.json.

obsoleteTech.title: Obsolete Tech
obsoleteTech.description: After researching this tech, the unit can no longer be built. Must be in Techs.json.

upgradesTo.title: Upgrades To
upgradesTo.description: Unit that this unit can upgrade to when it is available. Must be in Units.json.

uniqueTo.title: Unique To
uniqueTo.description: Designates that only this nation can build this unit. Must be exact name of existing nation.

replaces.title: Replaces
replaces.description: For unique units: the name of the original unit that this unit replaces for the uniqueTo nation.

promotions.title: Promotions
promotions.description: Promotions that the unit gets on creation. Must be exact names of existing promotions.

items.title: Promotion
items.description: Promotion that the unit gets on creation. Must be exact name of existing promotion in UnitPromotions.json.

attackSound.title: Attack Sound
attackSound.description: The sound that is played when the unit attacks.

replacementTextForUniques.title: Replacement Text For Uniques
replacementTextForUniques.description: Freeform text that will be shown to users, overriding the list of uniques.
